title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Education (Alteration of Name of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Education (Alteration of Name of 

Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 2 May 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited education (alteration name department title minister) order 2025 (2) order come operation 2 may 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Oideachais and, in the English language, the 
Department of Education, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an Roinn 
Oideachais agus Óige and, in the English language, to that of the Department of 
Education and Youth.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn oideachais english language department education altered irish language roinn oideachais agus oige english language department education youth

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Oideachais and, in the English 
language, the Minister for Education, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of 
an tAire Oideachais agus Óige and, in the English language, to that of the 
Minister for Education and Youth.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire oideachais english language minister education altered irish language taire oideachais agus oige english language minister education youth

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: In any enactment or instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Education shall be construed as 
references to the Department of Education and Youth, and 

references to the Minister for Education shall be construed as 
references to the Minister for Education and Youth. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Government, 
29 April, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 2nd May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [179] 3
